Verses: 1 orunaal Savulin Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaan Than Aayudhadhaariyaakiya Vaalipanai Nokki: Namakku Edhiraaka Andhap Pakkaththil Irukkira Pelisdharin Thaanaiyaththirkup Povom Vaa Endru Sonnaan; Adhai Avan Than Thakappanukku Arivikkavillai.
2 savul Kipiyaavin Kataisi Munaiyaakiya Mikronile Oru Maadhalamaraththinkeezh Irundhaan; Avanotekoota Irundha Janangal Erakkuraiya Arunooruperaayirundhaarkal.

3 seelovile Karththarutaiya Aasaariyanaayirundha Eliyin Kumaaranaakiya Pinekaasukkup Pirandha Ikkapoththin Sakodharanum Akidhoopin Kumaaranumaakiya Akiyaa Enpavan Epoththaith Thariththavanaayirundhaan; Yonaththaan Ponadhai Janangal Ariyaadhirundhaarkal.

4 yonaththaan Pelisdharin Thaanaiyaththirkup Pokappaarththa Vazhikalin Natuve, Indhappakkam Oru Senguththaana Paaraiyum, Andhappakkam Oru Senguththaana Paaraiyum Irundhadhu; Ondrukkup Poses Endru Per, Matrondrukkuch Chene Endru Per.
5 andhap Paaraikalil Ondru Vatakke Mikmaasukku Edhiraakavum, Matrondru Therke Kipiyaavukku Edhiraakavum Irundhadhu.

6 yonaththaan Than Aayudhadhaariyaakiya Vaalipanai Nokki: Viruththasedhanam Illaadhavarkalutaiya Andhath Thaanaiyaththirkup Povom Vaa; Oruvelai Karththarnamakkaaka Oru Kaariyam Seyvaar; Anekamperaik Kontaakilum, Konjam Peraik Kontaakilum, Ratchikkak Karththarukkuth Thataiyillai Endraan.
7 appozhudhu Avan Aayudhadhaari Avanaip Paarththu: Ummutaiya Irudhayaththil Irukkirapatiyellaam Seyyum; Appatiye Pom; Idho, Ummutaiya Manadhukku Etrapati Naanum Ummotekoota Varukiren Endraan.
8 adharku Yonaththaan: Idho, Naam Katandhu, Andha Manusharitaththirkup Pokiravarkalpola Avarkalukku Nammaik Kaanpippom.
9 naangal Ungalitaththukku Varumattum Nillungal Endru Nammote Solvaarkalaanaal, Naam Avarkalitaththukku Erippokaamal, Nammutaiya Nilaiyile Nirpom.
10 engalitaththukku Erivaarungal Endru Solvaarkalaanaal, Erippovom; Karththar Avarkalai Nammutaiya Kaiyil Oppukkotuththaar; Idhu Namakku Ataiyaalam Endraan.
11 appatiye Avarkal Iruvarum Pelisdharin Thaanaiyaththirmun Thangalaik Kaanpiththaarkal; Appozhudhu Pelisdhar: Idho, Epireyar Oliththuk Kontirundha Valaikalaivittup Purappatukiraarkal Endru Solli,

12 thaanaiyam Irukkira Manushar Yonaththaanaiyum Avan Aayudhadhaariyaiyum Paarththu: Engalitaththukku Erivaarungal, Ungalukkup Puththi Karpippom Endraarkal; Appozhudhu Yonaththaan Than Aayudhadhaariyai Nokki: En Pinnaale Erivaa; Karththar Avarkalai Isravelin Kaiyil Oppukkotuththaar Endru Solli,

13 yonaththaan Than Kaikalaalum Than Kaalkalaalum Thavazhndhu Erinaan. Avan Aayudhadhaari Avan Pinnaale Erinaan; Appozhudhu Avarkal Yonaththaanukku Munpaaka Matindhu Vizhundhaarkal; Avan Aayudhadhaariyum Avan Pinnaale Vettikkonte Ponaan.
14 yonaththaanum Avan Aayudhadhaariyum Atiththa Andha Mundhina Atiyile Erakkuraiya Irupadhuper Araiyer Nilamaana Visaalaththile Vizhundhaarkal.

15 appozhudhu Paalayaththilum Veliyilum, Sakala Janangalilum, Payangaram Untaaki, Thaanaiyam Irundhavarkalum Kollaiyitappona Thantilullavarkalungootath Thikil Ataindhaarkal; Poomiyum Adhirndhadhu; Adhu Thevanaal Untaana Payangaramaayirundhadhu.
16 penyameen Naattilulla Kipiyaavile Savulukku Irundha Jaamakkaarar Paarththu: Idho, Andha Eraalamaana Koottam Kalaindhu, Oruvarmel Oruvar Vizhukiradhaik Kantaarkal.

17 appozhudhu Savul Thannotekoota Irukkira Janangalai Nokki: Nammitaththilirundhu Ponavarkal Yaar Endru Ilakkampaarungal Endraan; Avarkal Ilakkam Paarkkirapodhu, Idho, Yonaththaanum Avan Aayudhadhaariyum Ange Illai Endru Kantaarkal.
18 appozhudhu Savul Akeeyaavai Nokki: Thevanutaiya Pettiyaik Kontuvaa Endraan; Thevanutaiya Petti Annaatkalil Isravel Puththiraritaththil Irundhadhu.
19 ippatich Chavul Aasaariyanote Pesukaiyil, Pelisdharin Paalayaththil Untaana Kalakam Varavara Adhikariththadhu; Appozhudhu Savul Aasaariyanaip Paarththu: Irukkattum Endraan.
20 savulum Avanotirundha Janangalum Koottangootip Porkkalaththirkup Ponaarkal; Oruvar Pattayam Oruvarukku Virodhamaayirundhapatiyaal Makaa Amaliyuntaayitru.
21 idharkumun Pelisdharutan Kooti Avarkalotekootap Paalayaththile Thirindhu Vandha Epireyarum, Savulotum Yonaththaanotum Irukkira Isravelarote Kootikkontaarkal.
22 eppiraayeem Malaikalil Oliththukkontirundha Sakala Isravelarum Pelisdhar Murindhotukiradhaik Kelvippattapodhu, Yuththaththile Avarkalai Nerungith Thotarndhaarkal.
23 ippatik Karththar Andraiyadhinam Isravelai Ratchiththaar; Andha Yuththam Peththaavenmattum Natandhadhu.

24 isravelar Andraiyadhinam Mikundha Varuththam Ataindhaarkal: Naan En Saththurukkal Kaiyile Pazhivaanga Ventum, Saayangaalamattum Porukkaamal Evan Pojanam Seykiraano Avan Sapikkappattavan Endru Savul Janangalukku Aanaiyittuch Cholliyirundhapatiyaal, Janangalil Oruvarum Evvalavenum Pojanampannaadhirundhaarkal.
25 thesaththu Janangal Ellaarum Oru Kaattile Vandhaarkal; Ange Veliyile Thenkootu Kattiyirundhadhu.
26 janangal Kaattile Vandhapodhu, Idho, Then Ozhukikkontirundhadhu; Aanaalum Oruvanum Adhaith Than Kaiyinaale Thottuth Than Vaayil Vaikkavillai; Janangal Andha Aanaiyinimiththam Payappattaarkal.

27 yonaththaan Than Thakappan Janangalukku Aanaiyittadhaik Kelvippatavillai; Avan Than Kaiyilirundha Kolaineetti, Adhin Nuniyinaale Thenkoottaik Kuththi, Adhai Etuththuth Than Vaayile Pottukkontaan; Adhinaal Avan Kankal Thelindhadhu.

28 appozhudhu Janangalil Oruvan: Indraikku Pojanam Saappitukiravan Sapikkappattavan Endru Ummutaiya Thakappanaar Janangalukku Urudhiyaai Aanaiyittirukkiraar; Aakaiyinaal Janangal Vitaaiththirukkiraarkal Endraan.
29 appozhudhu Yonaththaan: En Thakappan Thesaththin Janangalaik Kalakkappatuththinaar; Naan Indhath Thenile Konjam Rusipaarththadhinaale, En Kankal Thelindhadhaip Paarungal.

30 indraiyadhinam Janangal Thangalukku Akappatta Thangal Saththurukkalin Kollaiyile Edhaakilum Pusiththirundhaal, Eththanai Nalamaayirukkum; Pelisdharukkul Untaana Sangaaram Mikavum Adhikamaayirukkume Endraan.
31 avarkal Andraiyadhinam Mikmaasilirundhu Aayalonmattum Pelisdharai Muriya Atiththapodhu, Janangal Mikavum Vitaaiththirundhaarkal.
32 appozhudhu Janangal Kollaiyinmel Paaindhu, Aatukalaiyum Maatukalaiyum Kandrukkuttikalaiyum Pitiththu, Tharaiyile Pottu Atiththu, Iraththaththotum Pusiththaarkal.

33 appozhudhu: Idho, Iraththaththotirukkiradhaip Pusikkiradhinaal Janangal Karththarukku Elaadha Paavam Seykiraarkal Endru Savulukku Ariviththaarkal; Avan: Neengal Thurokampannineerkal; Ippodhe Oru Periya Kallai Ennitaththil Uruttikkontuvaarungal.

34 neengal Janaththirkulle Poi, Iraththaththotirukkiradhaich Chaappitukiradhinaale, Karththarukku Elaadha Paavam Seyyaadhapatikku, Avaravar Thangal Maattaiyum Avaravar Thangal Aattaiyum Ennitaththil Kontuvandhu, Inge Atiththu, Pinpu Saappitaventum Endru Avarkalukkuch Chollungal Endru Kattalaiyittaan; Aakaiyaal Janangal Ellaarum Avaravar Thangal Maatukalai Andru Iraaththiri Thaangale Kontuvandhu, Ange Atiththaarkal.
35 pinpu Savul Karththarukku Oru Palipeetaththaik Kattinaan; Adhu Avan Karththarukkuk Kattina Mudhalaavadhu Palipeetam.

36 adharkuppinpu Savul: Naam Indha Iraaththiriyile Pelisdharaith Thotarndhupoi, Vitiyarkaala Velichchamaakumattum Avarkalaik Kollaiyittu, Avarkalil Oruvaraiyum Meedhiyaaka Vaikkaadhiruppomaaka Endraan. Adharku Avarkal: Ummutaiya Kankalukku Nalamaanapatiyellaam Seyyum Endraarkal. Aasaariyano: Naam Inge Thevasannidhiyil Serakkatavom Endraan.
37 appatiye: Pelisdharaith Thotarndhupokalaamaa? Avarkalai Isravelin Kaiyil Oppukkotuppeeraa? Endru Savul Thevanitaththil Visaariththaan; Avar Andha Naalile Avanukku Maruuththaravu Arulavillai.
38 appozhudhu Savul: Janaththin Thalaivarkale, Neengal Ellaarum Inge Serndhuvandhu, Indru Indhap Paavam Edhinaale Untaayitru Endru Paarththariyungal.

39 adhu En Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaanitaththil Kaanappattaalum, Avan Saakave Saakaventum Endru Isravelai Ratchikkira Karththarutaiya Jeevanaik Kontu Sollukiren Endraan; Sakala Janangalukkullum Oruvanum Avanukkup Piradhiyuththaram Sollavillai.

40 adharkuppin Avan Isravelar Ellaaraiyum Nokki: Neengal Andhappakkaththile Irungal; Naanum En Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaanum Indhappakkaththil Iruppom Endraan; Janangal Savulaip Paarththu: Ummutaiya Kankalukku Nalamaanapati Seyyum Endraarkal.

41 appozhudhu Savul Isravelin Thevanaakiya Karththarai Nokki: Nidhaanamaaik Kattalaiyittu Yadhaarththaththai Vilangappannum Endraan; Appozhudhu Yonaththaanmelum Savulin Melum Seettu Vizhundhadhu, Janangalo Thappinaarkal.
42 enakkum En Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaanukkum Seettuppotungal Endru Savul Sonnapodhu, Yonaththaanmel Seettu Vizhundhadhu.

43 appozhudhu Savul Yonaththaanaippaarththu: Nee Seydhadhu Enna? Enakkuch Chol Endru Kettaan. Adharku Yonaththaan: En Kaiyil Irukkira Kolin Nuniyinaale Konjam Then Etuththu Rusipaarththen; Adharkaaka Naan Saakaventum Endraan.
44 appozhudhu Savul: Yonaththaane, Nee Saakaththaanventum; Illaavittaal Thevan Enakku Adharkuch Chariyaakavum Adharku Adhikamaakavum Seyyakkatavar Endraan.

45 janangalo Savulai Nokki: Isravelile Indhap Periya Iratchippaich Cheydha Yonaththaan Kolaiseyyappatalaamaa? Adhu Kootaadhu; Avan Thalaiyil Irukkira Oru Mayirum Tharaiyile Vizhappokiradhillai Endru Karththarutaiya Jeevanaikkontu Aanaiyittuch Chollukirom; Thevan Thunai Nirka Avan Indru Kaariyaththai Natappiththaan Endraarkal; Appatiye Yonaththaan Saakaadhapatikku, Janangal Avanaith Thappuviththaarkal.
46 savul Pelisdharaith Thotaraamal Thirumpivittaan; Pelisdharum Thangal Sdhalaththirkup Poivittaarkal.

47 ippatich Chavul Isravelai Aalukira Raajyapaaraththaip Petrukkontu, Sutrilum Irukkira Thannutaiya Ellaach Chaththurukkalumaakiya Movaapiyarukkum, Ammon Puththirarukkum, Edhomiyarukkum, Sopaavin Raajaakkalukkum, Pelisdharukkum Virodhamaaka Yuththam Panni, Evarkal Mel Pataiyetuththaano, Avarkalaiyellaam Atakkinaan.
48 avan Palaththu, Amalekkiyarai Muriya Atiththu, Isravelaraik Kollaiyitukira Yaavar Kaikkum Avarkalai Neengalaakki Iratchiththaan.
49 savulukku Irundha Kumaarar: Yonaththaan, Isvi, Malkisoovaa Enpavarkal; Avanutaiya Irantu Kumaaraththikalil, Mooththaval Per Merap, Ilaiyaval Per Meekaal.
50 savulutaiya Manaiviyin Per Akinovaam, Aval Akimaasin Kumaaraththi: Avanutaiya Senaapadhiyinper Apner, Avan Savulutaiya Siriyadhakappanaakiya Nerin Kumaaran.
51 kees Savulin Thakappan; Apnerin Thakappanaakiya Ner Aapiyelin Kumaaran.

52 savul Irundha Naalellaam Pelisdharin Mel Katinamaana Yuththam Natandhadhu; Savul Oru Paraakkiramasaaliyaiyaakilum Oru Palasaaliyaiyaakilum Kaanumpodhu, Avarkal Ellaaraiyum Thannitamaakach Cherththukkolluvaan.
